tagline: Waltz is a web.py framework for designing web apps in 3/4 time
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Waltz
body:
### Overview

Waltz-example is a repository which demonstrates the benefits of the Waltz (v.0.1.62) framework. Waltz is a web.py based web framework for rapidly designing web apps in 3/4 time. Waltz comes pre-configured, ready to run, and includes features like out-of-the-box support for analytics tracking. Waltz and never miss a beat.

### Installation

```
$ sudo pip install --upgrade waltz
$ git clone http://github.com/mekarpeles/waltz-example
$ cd waltz-example
$ python main.py # <port> optional; defaults to port 8080 
```
